name: @modelcontextprotocol/server-sheet-music
description: MCP App Server for rendering and playing sheet music from ABC notation

scripts.build: tsc --noEmit && cross-env INPUT=mcp-app.html vite build && tsc -p tsconfig.server.json && node --experimental-strip-types node_modules/.bin/esbuild server.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --packages=external --outfile=dist/server.js && node --experimental-strip-types node_modules/.bin/esbuild main.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --packages=external --banner:js='#!/usr/bin/env node' --outfile=dist/index.js
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run watch" "npm run serve"
